title: Pocket Piggy
description: A mobile app that lets parents and kids manage money together. Parents can add funds to kids accounts and add chores and kids can make wishlists accept chores and ask permission to buy the things with the money in their account.

title: Le Baguette
description: A managment dashboard for a fictional 5-star Michelin resturant. Manage menu, ingredients, employees and seating.

title: Sports Roster
description: A fun manager for your fantasy baseball team that displays your roster as animated classic baseball cards.
